lines.text: [Roscoe and his assistant Billy are detailing the specifications of his rainmaking machine]

[angrily]
Aw, we can see through you!

[to Billy]
When you get the machine started, drown him first, will you?
I could use a bright boy like you! You could be my assistant. Do you know anything about machinery?
I know all about plows and tractors and things...
Good! Then I'll be your assistant.
